ygData.subject: Re: D.E.D meeting!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Spinister nodded his head. He folded his arms, and sat there watching. Singe leapt off and transformed. Yeah, we ve known Needlenose since the binary bonding

Spinister nodded his head. He folded his arms, and sat there watching.
Singe leapt off and transformed. "Yeah, we've known Needlenose since the
binary bonding on..." he was cut off by a glare from Spinister, and
decided it best to be quiet.
